name: Your choices matter
description:
Your choices matter                                              Play in fullscreen!

Your choices matter is a game where you help your friend to rob a bank.  During the game you get choices, that decide where the story is going to go. You can succeed, or fail, or anything else. All based on your decisions. Can you get a good ending?

GMTK game jam 2021

This game was made for the GMTK game jam 2021. It was hosted by Game maker's toolkit. The time to build a game was 48 hours.

Theme: Linked together

This game follows that theme. Your actions are linked together and produce the end result.

Link to game jam: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2021

What was made during the jam?

All the art was made during the game jam.

Sound effects were made using sfxr, during the jam.

All the code was written during the jam.
